entry.title: Replying to @Toad Trans women do NOT threaten women's sports. If you want to learn more, come to my workshop about trans athletes tomorrow at 6pm ET - pinkmantaray.com/workshops to sign up. #transathlete #trans #transgender #womenssports #gender #transwom
entry.content: Replying to @Toad Trans women do NOT threaten women's sports. If you want to learn more, come to my workshop about trans athletes tomorrow at 6pm ET - pinkmantaray.com/workshops to sign up. #transathlete #trans #transgender #womenssports #gender #transwomenarewomen #transwomen #transathletesbelonginsports #inclusion #dei #sports

entry.title: Happy, fighting, celebrating, protesting, remembering, paying-tribute-to Pride. Never forget the trans and queer women of color who began Pride. Never forget that Pride began as a riot against police brutality. Never forget that we know who we are. Allies
entry.content: Happy, fighting, celebrating, protesting, remembering, paying-tribute-to Pride. Never forget the trans and queer women of color who began Pride. Never forget that Pride began as a riot against police brutality. Never forget that we know who we are. Allies, get cued into what's going on tomorrow evening at my Trans Activism & You workshop. Register at the link in bio or at pinkmantaray.com/workshops ğŸ³ï¸â€âš§ï¸ğŸ’• #transgender #pride #transpride #transman #transition #genderaffirmation #transisbeautiful #gender #transjoy #transrights

entry.title: Replying to @Ava A few weeks ago, @Dylan Mulvaney and I chatted on my podcast DEAR SCHUYLER about dealing with transphobia as trans people - and grace was Dylan's word of the week. Take a listen to the whole episode at dearschuyler.com or anywhere you get
entry.content: Replying to @Ava A few weeks ago, @Dylan Mulvaney and I chatted on my podcast DEAR SCHUYLER about dealing with transphobia as trans people - and grace was Dylan's word of the week. Take a listen to the whole episode at dearschuyler.com or anywhere you get your podcasts! #dearschuyler #podcast #transgender #transpodcast #trans #grace #transphobia #haters #lgbtq #pride
